name: Large Volcano Effect Diffusore Aromatico (plug) Two Colours
description: Large Volcano Effect Diffusore Aromatico with a capacity of 560 ml.Add certain amount of water and few drops of your favourite olio essenziale to elevate your aromatherapy experience. The light mist this humidifier produces creates an amazing 3D flame or volcanic effect, allowing you to adjust between warm yellow flames and cool blue flames.Powered by an ultrasonic motor, this diffuser operates quietly. It can be operated effortlessly with a single button or conveniently switched between various modes and effects using the included remote control.Safety and convenience are assured with the Timer function and built-in protection chip. You can set the humidifier to turn off automatically every 3 or 6 hours, ensuring peace of mind during your restful sleep. The built-in protective chip ensures the unit switches off when the water level is low, preventing any potential risks. Its versatility makes it perfect for use at home, hotels, schools, bedrooms, baby rooms, yoga studios, air-conditioned spaces, and dry areas. Enhance your space with the soothing fragranza of your favourite olio essenziales and create a delightful relaxing atmosphere. NB: To ensure the longevity of your product, avoid cleaning it directly with tap water or wetting the power input, as this may lead to a short circuit. We recommend using a cotton cloth for cleaning purposes.
descriptionHtml:
Large Volcano Effect Aroma Diffuser with a capacity of 560 ml.

Add certain amount of water and few drops of your favourite essential oil to elevate your aromatherapy experience. The light mist this humidifier produces creates an amazing 3D flame or volcanic effect, allowing you to adjust between warm yellow flames and cool blue flames.

Powered by an ultrasonic motor, this diffuser operates quietly. It can be operated effortlessly with a single button or conveniently switched between various modes and effects using the included remote control.

Safety and convenience are assured with the timer function and built-in protection chip. You can set the humidifier to turn off automatically every 3 or 6 hours, ensuring peace of mind during your restful sleep. The built-in protective chip ensures the unit switches off when the water level is low, preventing any potential risks. 

Its versatility makes it perfect for use at home, hotels, schools, bedrooms, baby rooms, yoga studios, air-conditioned spaces, and dry areas. Enhance your space with the soothing fragrance of your favourite essential oils and create a delightful relaxing atmosphere. 

NB: To ensure the longevity of your product, avoid cleaning it directly with tap water or wetting the power input, as this may lead to a short circuit. We recommend using a cotton cloth for cleaning purposes.
